titles.title: African Diaspora Heritage Month Act of 2025
African Diaspora Heritage Month Act of 2025
A bill to direct the President to designate a month as African Diaspora Heritage Month.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
African Diaspora Heritage Month Act of 2025
This bill requires the President to designate by proclamation African Diaspora Heritage Month. The proclamation shall be issued every year and urge the observation of African Diaspora Heritage Month by state and local governments.
